v1.19.0.description: refactored to extend from hero-item-base (new script dependency), inherits sloppy click functionallity now
fixes issue with initial image fade in for IE and Edge.

v1.17.0.description: fixes issue with image size, text and button placement on scroll and when the module is lower than the top most element on the page.
fixes issue with image resize on vertical browser resize, debounce image resize function.
fixes an issue where certain styles were not being applied correctly on small viewports in Internet Explorer

v1.16.0.description: adds fade-in animations to foreground content to improve loading experience and remove flash of content
